title: #Caste is Not a Rumour: The Online Diary of Rohith Vemula
description: Student leader Rohith Vemula, who died on January 17, 2016, was a prolific writer on Facebook, where he discussed everything from caste to cows. From 2008 to his last posts in January 2016, his words hold a mirror to the working of caste in modern India.
author: Rohith Vemula
